articles.title: Ashes, 5th Test: Ricky Ponting left fuming as Oval crowd hits him with grapes - India Today
articles.description: Ashes 2023: Former Australia captain Ricky Ponting was hit by grapes as he was completing his broadcasting duties after the opening day's play of the 5th Test at The Oval in London.
articles.content: By India Today Sports Desk: Legendary Australia batter Ricky Ponting was left fuming at the end of the opening day of the 5th Ashes Test in London. The former Australia captain was hit by grapes by a… [+2286 chars]

articles.title: How to watch England, Argentina and China in the 2023 Women’s World Cup - CNN
articles.description: This year’s Women’s World Cup saw one of its biggest upsets Thursday when Nigeria beat co-host Australia 3-2, and spectators will be hoping for as much drama Friday.
